text: Stuck  I wish I didn t have to die I ve been struggling long enough to recognize my warning signs and disconnect my thoughts and urges from my self  That doesn t make dying and other self destructive behaviours any less appealing  I know when I need help  and what I need  but no one is ever there  no one ever  listens   I m suicidal  but I don t want to die  My brain tells me to kill myself constantly  but I believe that I can improve my life  and quite honestly  my ADHD makes putting a solid plan and going through with it near impossible   I m stuck in this situation where I m depressed  constantly on edge  binge eating every day  dealing with horrible intrusive thoughts  feeling myself deteriorating and desperately want to  get better  because I know dying isn t the only option  But  at the same time  feeling so alone  stuck  and ignored because I m not actively trying to kill myself or dying and no one takes me seriously that it s starting to seem like the only option   It s taken so long for me to come to this state of self awareness  of realizing triggering situations  yet it means nothing because I still don t have the solutions or coping mechanisms  It s like being kidnapped  and finally finding a phone to call someone  only for them to say  sorry I m busy  and hang up   At this point  I m seriously considering suicide  I don t want to  but it feels like I have to now  I m losing hope in the concept of recovery  It s too scary being aware of your disfunction  but feeling powerless to stop it
summary: Suicide seems to be the only option for a depressed person with ADHD. He is depressed, on edge, binge-eating and having intrusive thoughts. He doesn't want to die, but he doesn't know how to improve his life.

text: I thought I could make it in college but it seems like I can t I m taking summer classes and I m on term   right now  In term   I got a D in my chemistry class which is failing for my major  I was able to move on to the next chemistry class but my professor doesn t believe I can do it  I have a lot of medical issues including fibromyalgia and some sort of sleep disorder  I couldn t stay awake for more than   hours at a time but now I m on Ritalin this term  I m just doubting myself a lot  If I don t pass this class this term I won t be able to move onto my next two major classes and I ll be super behind  I already missed my first semester due to my medical issues  My goal is to become a doctor but at this point I don t see it happening  I got essentially all C s my first semester and then that D last summer term  those are just the intro classes too  I just feel like an idiot and lazy  I don t even want to be alive  I m only alive for my family and for the possibility of being a doctor  I m just so tired of trying to work hard and getting no where  I just wish all my medical issues would be solved  It seems like when one gets solved or is starting to get solved another one pops up and I m so tired of it  I just don t understand why people want me to be alive and suffer through horrible pain all the time  I just want to be able to do well in college  to do well in life  but it seems like I m destained not to  People suggested me changing my career goals but I don t see myself doing anything else  I like being able to make people better or at least try to because I can t make myself better  fibromyalgia has no cure and none of the dozens of meds I ve tried have really worked for me  People keep telling me it s all get better  but when  I m tired of trying  I feel like I ve just given up in school and in life at this point
summary: In term he got a D in his chemistry class which is failing for his major. He has a lot of medical issues including fibromyalgia and some sort of sleep disorder. His goal is to become a doctor. He missed the first semester of college due to his medical issues.
cleaned: term get chemistry class fail major lot medical issue include fib myalgia sort sleep disorder goal doctor miss semester college medical issue
